name: survey-target
title: Survey Target
description: An intended scope for dwc:Occurrences in an eco:Survey.
examples: `all bird species`; `all bird species except Larus gulls, fulmars and kittiwakes`; `reproductive female Ctenomys sociabilis (only)`; `Oncorhynchus mykiss and Oncorhynchus clarkii (only)`, `all total lengths except < 12 inches`
rdfs:comment: A specification of a characteristics of dwc:Occurrences that were included or excluded in an eco:Survey.

fields.name: surveyTargetID
fields.title: Survey Target ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier. Note: values of this term are not meant to be unique within a dwc:SurveyTarget. A full dwc:SurveyTarget is composed of all records that share the same dwc:surveyTargetID.

fields.name: surveyID
fields.title: Survey ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: surveyTargetType
fields.title: Survey Target Type
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetTypeIRI
fields.title: Survey Target Type IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for a type of target.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The nature or genre of the resource.

fields.name: surveyTargetTypeSource
fields.title: Survey Target Type Source
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in dwc:surveyTargetType is given.
fields.rdfs:comment: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

fields.name: surveyTargetValue
fields.title: Survey Target Value
fields.description: A value of a characteristic to include or exclude in a dwc:SurveyTarget for a given dwc:surveyTargetType.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetValueIRI
fields.title: Survey Target Value IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for a target value.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetValueSource
fields.title: Survey Target Value Source
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in dwc:surveyTargetValue is given.
fields.rdfs:comment: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnit
fields.title: Survey Target Unit
fields.description: Unit associated with a value in dwc:surveyTargetValue.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnitIRI
fields.title: Survey Target Unit IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for a target unit.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnitSource
fields.title: Survey Target Unit Source
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in dwc:surveyTargetUnit is given.
fields.rdfs:comment: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

fields.name: includeOrExclude
fields.title: Include Or Exclude
fields.description: Whether the combination of dwc:surveyTargetType and dwc:surveyTargetValue is included or excluded in a dwc:SurveyTarget.
fields.comments: Combinations of dwc:SurveyTarget records of inclusions and exclusions can define complex scopes such as all flying adult Aves except Passeriformes. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary consisting of 'include' and 'exclude' only.

fields.name: isSurveyTargetFullyReported
fields.title: Is Survey Target Fully Reported
fields.description: A declaration of whether the counts for an instance of the dwc:SurveyTarget report everything that matches the declared dwc:SurveyTarget.
fields.comments: If true (the survey target is fully reported - nothing was left unreported), then this enables inference of absence of detection for everything in that dwc:SurveyTarget that is included but that does not appear in the counts (absent counts signify absence of detection).
